tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE football_injuries (
    player_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    injury_type VARCHAR(50),
    injury_date DATE,
    recovery_time INT,
    medical_evaluation VARCHAR(200),
    fitness_level VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE Injuries (
    injury_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    player_id INT,
    injury_type VARCHAR(50),
    injury_date DATE,
    recovery_time INT
);
